name: Age Of Bugman
description:
This is the story of Bugman, the little tumor who need to feed himself with bloody heart to evolve in new environments. This is a platformer game of 4 levels where the fastest you go, the best score you'll get. Each level of the game will show a more evolved Bugman, but this isn't even his final form.

Artist and Audio:    William Bouchard 

Programmers:  Michaël Bélanger and Raphaël Doye
